original_message: This is a feature request for google drive integration with mattermost please
details: Google Drive integration is not explicitly listed in our product info; however, Mattermost already offers integrations with various tools, including Google Drive. The request for Google Drive integration is significant to us, and our team is actively considering it for future updates.
summary: Feature Request: Google Drive Integration with Mattermost
description: This is a feature request for integrating Google Drive with Mattermost.
